lyrics:
29 contributorsfeel again lyricsverse 1
its been a long time coming since ive seen your face
ive been everywhere and back trying to replace
everything that i had til my feet went numb
prayin like a fool thats been on the run
hearts still beating but its not working
its like a milliondollar phone that you just cant ring
i reached out trying to love but i feel nothing
yeah my heart is numb

yeah
